definition: pink collar/woman working in the service industry
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: After graduation from college, She underwent several setbacks and finally decided to be a pink-collared worker.
sentences.chinese: 大學畢業後，幾經周折，她最終成了一名粉領。
